Suites: NPOAPI-27, RG
Test
---
!*> Test-specific items
!define midAncestor {POMS_S_BNN_097259}
!define start {17-5-2010 15:30} #1274103000000
*!
|script                                    |
|$start=|convert datetime|${start}|to epoch|

!4 Item in response has starttime that equals value of now parameter

|Get value at path                                                             |
|get                                                              |path |value?|
|schedule/ancestor/${midAncestor}/now?now=2010-05-17T13:30:00.000Z|start|$start|

!4 Item in response has given object as ancestor

|script                                                  |
|$midNext=   |json path|midRef                           |
|Check object|$midNext |is a descendant of|${midAncestor}|
